data.name: THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV - DLC Costume "GAROU: MotW TERRY"
data.detailed_description:
- Terry Bogard Costume for THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV
Terry Bogard's costume can be changed to the costume he wore in "GAROU: Mark of the Wolves".
data.about_the_game:
- Terry Bogard Costume for THE KING OF FIGHTERS XV

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 770 2GB / AMD Radeon R9 280 3GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD Radeon RX 480 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
